Summary: I stopped to but used tire's when I stopped at the person's house we were talking and I happen to look up and I saw this bright star object heading North over the mountain
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Shamokin
There were no other sightings in Shamokin on or around February 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in front of a friends Garage when I happened to look up and saw a star like objectthat moved in a straight formation towards the North I asked him if he could see it and by that very time just as I asked him what it was the object faded out and was unseen very strange I was only suppose to pick up 2 tire's for my mother's car I have seen my shair of UFO's over the summer but not thinking they would be out in the cold weather I guess I assumed wrong now they can bee seen at any time I wasn't going to report this one but it was so over whelming to me to see one again if anyone could contact me with the same report my email is wright10301973@gmail.com
